ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: i will recommend to any student interested in finance
Recommend without any researvation. Anyone who want to have some real understanding of finance should take this class.
Take it! Take it! Take it! Take it! But make sure your handle of empirical work is strong. The papers are awesome and cutting-edge. The lectures are clear. The course is exciting.

The course is an extensive and well-taught survey of behavioral finance. Due to its thoughtful treatment of topics in finance and behavioral economics, I would strongly recommend the course to any economics/finance PhD student interested in or looking for inspiration in either field.

I would highly recommend the course, NOT ONLY to those interested in behavioral finance/economics, because:a)beh. economics/finance is becoming part of the mainstreamb)the course has given me a lot in terms of thinking critically about research (relevant for every student)

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: i plan to do some work in this field, but have not formed a solid idea
It made me more interested in behavioral economics and the models and empirics of both behavioral finance and behavioral economics.

I took this course because of my interest in behavioral economics, the work of Professor Barberis, and the course's strong reputation. I finished the course with a much broadened knowledge of and interest in finance, particularly its puzzles and their behavioral explanations.I have started one research project related to the course, and I am planning others.

Behavioral Finance/Economics becoming part of the mainstream, from that perspective doing the course is a must => significantly broaden my knowledge.It did contribute to my research, if my research proposal for the course goes well, I will definitely use it.
